timeline.message: Updates to the latest sirius versions.

Makes the BasePageHelper aware of the debugging mode.

If a query is prefixed with "??" we will output the effective
query as user message.

Completes a refactoring in sirius-db.

We made DateRange a fully immutable class and
now have to manually carry the "useLocalDate" along.

Fixes the comparison within a template.

Otherwise job presets don't work as
the previously selected parameter is always lost.

Completes a refactoring of sirius-web.

Instead of returning a boolean value, we now
use an explicit enum constant.

Always execute the beforeSaveHandlers bevor performing the isChanged check.

We might fill a computed field which marks the entity as changed
(even in the "created" case). This is highly unlikely, but consistent.

Only updates or creates a MongoEntity if it was changed.

The same code was already present in the SQLEntityImportHandler.

Disabled batch updates/inserts by default.

We ran into several problems with MariaDB when performing concurrent
batch updates. This happens, as during a batch run, sections of the primary
key get locked which might lead to a deadlock within MariaDB if concurrent
batches update the same table (which isn't that unlikely).

As this would/will abort one batch update/transaction and therefore would
lead to dataloss / an abort of an import, we rather play safe (by default),
and always succeed.

Permits to supply a default value for a DataRangeParameter.

We apply this parameter if the given value is null,
which signals that the initial context is setup.

If the value is "", we no longer apply the default, as this is
a post value and we still need to support optional parameters.
Adds some helper constructors and a default label for the date range parameter.

Fixes the default value handling when also supporting optional parameters.

We apply this parameter if the given value is null,
which signals that the initial context is setup.

If the value is "", we no longer apply the default, as this is
a post value and we still need to support optional parameters.
Provides a base job which can transform a line based file into another.
